title: Medicaid Architecture and the $911B Question
prompt: A weathered wooden table scattered with papers, calculators, and reading glasses in soft morning light filtering through a kitchen window; a hand reaching across ledgers and budget documents, with rural farmland visible blurred in the background through the panes, conveying the weight of difficult fiscal decisions made in ordinary spaces rather than boardrooms. Muted earth tones, grainy documentary-style photography with shallow depth of field emphasizing the textures of worn paper and the solidity of rural life interrupted by abstract policy consequences.
